forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the air carries a distinctly crisp clarity, the kind that hints at the strength of the sun piercing through. With a high hovering near 62, a gentle warmth envelops you as the breeze dances in, carrying the faint, briny kiss of the nearby ocean. The west-southwest wind, reaching up to 21 mph, adds a playful touch to the afternoon, whisking away any wayward thoughts and replacing them with a sense of vigor. Clouds are minimal, allowing the sun to assert its influence, though you might notice hints of a marine layer lingering to the north, softening the outlines of distant hills.

As twilight whispers its arrival, the forecast beckons a night wrapped in partial clouds, easing down to a comfortable 53. Evening plans are tantalizingly open—consider a wander along the waterfront, where the gleam of city lights will begin to twinkle against the shadows of the Bay. Since the temperatures will dip slightly, a light jacket or sweater will keep you at ease as the winds settle into the night. Enjoy this beautiful San Francisco day, where the balance of sun and breeze invites you to embrace the moment with quiet enjoyment.
